name: pixel-sensors
description: Device sensors on Pixel (Termux). Battery, WiFi, location when running on Android. Use when the user asks battery level, charging status, WiFi network, or location on the Pixel.

tools.name: get_pixel_device_status
tools.description: Get this device's status when running on a Pixel in Termux: battery level, charging state, temperature. Use when the user asks 'what's my battery', 'am I charging', 'device status', or 'how much battery left'. Returns a short summary for voice or chat.

tools.name: get_pixel_wifi
tools.description: Get current WiFi connection info on the Pixel (SSID, BSSID, link speed). Use when the user asks 'what WiFi am I on', 'connected network', or 'WiFi status'.

tools.name: get_pixel_location
tools.description: Get device location (GPS) on the Pixel. Use when the user asks 'where am I', 'my location', or 'GPS'. Requires location permission.
